name: Deviruchi Balloon Blueprint
description: The balloon made by the Devil Soul. With it, the wearer can get terribly powerful, but the mind will be gradually eroded.

name: Deviruchi Cookie
description: The Deviruchi-shaped butter cookies are fresh and hot from the oven, soft and delicious. Recover 20% HP (HP Regen ＋10%, lasts for 30 mins)

name: Deviruchi Hat
description: Hat made according to the look of Deviruchi. It looks fresh and cute. Not only the one wears it, but also people who see it will feel the happiness.

name: Deviruchi Hat Blueprint
description: Hat made according to the look of Deviruchi. It looks fresh and cute. Not only the one wears it, but also people who see it will feel the happiness.

name: Deviruchi Hat [1]
description: Hat made according to the look of Deviruchi. It looks fresh and cute. Not only the one wears it, but also people who see it will feel the happiness.

name: Deviruchi Headphone
description: It's said that songs from a certain horrible party can be heard only on a specific night each year.

name: Deviruchi Tail Blueprint
description: The wings made by the Devil Soul. With it, the wearer can get terribly powerful, but the mind will be gradually eroded.

name: Dex Bracelet
description: A bracelet that improves the wearer's wrist flexibility.

name: Dex Bracelet [1]
description: A bracelet that improves the wearer's wrist flexibility.

name: Dex Meal A
description: The legendary spring known as the source of all rivers and waters, it's said that all people have highly praised this wine. DEX ＋5, Ranged Damage ＋10%, This effect lasts 30 minutes.

name: Dex Meal B
description: The legendary spring known as the source of all rivers and waters, it's said that all people have highly praised this wine. DEX ＋10, Ranged Damage ＋20%, This effect lasts 30 minutes.

name: Diabolus Boots [1]
description: Mysterious boots that automatically adjust according to the size of the user's feet, like a living creature.

name: Diabolus Boots [2]
description: Mysterious boots that automatically adjust according to the size of the user's feet, like a living creature.

name: Diadem
description: God's spokesman - exclusive hat for Archbishop
